tool_description: Bank Identification Number (“BIN”) or Issuer identification number (“IIN”) is the first six digits of a bank card number or payment cards number
name: BIN INFO LOOKUP
title: BIN INFO LOOKUP

api_list.name: Bin lookup Pro
api_list.description: Provide the first 6-8 digits of a payment card number and get updated metadata such as country, type (debit or credit), segment (consumer or business) etc.
